Christy Smith: s votes to lay off teachers and notify teachers of possible layoffs during her tenure as a member of the Newhall School Board were verified.
It was confirmed that Smith: s votes ultimately led to the layoff of only one permanent teacher, providing context to the claim made in the ad.
The increase in the monthly stipend of N: 12.50, which Smith voted for, was verified.
The ad: s claims were supported by screenshots of portions of the minutes from three Newhall School Board meetings provided by the Congressional Leadership Fund, the super PAC responsible for the ad.
